title: Remove XP
body: Can you please remove xp from the item drop pool.  It adds another extra level of uneeded randomness. Where grabbing the guaranteed drops early game can ruin your game. It ruins your game by forcing you to level up in the early game so that you see fewer level 1 units. So it's harder to level up anything and keep yourself from falling behind. It also ruins the hyperroll strat.

replies.body: Hey but at least you will never die to Minions if you have already 3 Units 2nd Round! Kappa
Neither gold or xp should be in boxes. Would you sell an item for a few gold? Doubt it. Just give us a guaranteed item.

> [{quoted}](name=GrandNagusQuark,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=5mPB6bE3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-07-15T21:13:20.808+0000)
>
> Neither gold or xp should be in boxes. Would you sell an item for a few gold? Doubt it. Just give us a guaranteed item.

1 gold. You get 1 gold from boxes, while items are invaluable, prob worth 50+ gold.

I feel like people are putting way too much emphasis on getting their hyper level 1 units and severely undervalue leveling in general.

But it's still way worse than just having standardized item RNG

Yeah I don't have a clue how this became a thing.  They were going to add guaranteed items, but then they force you to level before you have time to hyper-roll???  Usually free XP is a good thing, but certain strategies and situations depend on you not leveling.  If you're in that situation, it's literally better to receive ABSOLUTELY NOTHING (just barely worse than the single coin) than to have your strat ruined with a forced level.
